name: Brenden Bishop
title: Builder & Technologist
intro: Builder and technologist blending code, product, and vision. 10+ years SWE, 4 years eng leadership. Award winner & 3x founder shipping real things.
bio:
I'm a product-minded technologist with 10+ years of experience building zero-to-one products. At Morgan Stanley, I lead five greenfield client-facing planning apps across E*TRADE and MS platforms, managing 12 engineers across 3 global squads. I earned the Tesla Award for Innovation and was a finalist in the OpenAI Hackathon, where I built Nevernote, an AI tool that turns meetings into structured docs using summarization pipelines.

I recently launched an internal AI bootcamp to teach LLMs, Copilot, and AI-assisted workflows, accelerating adoption across our org.

I'm also the founder of Forwheel, a platform serving 150+ food trucks, powered by our AI vendor advisor Garnish (OpenAI + RAG). I co-founded Rbitrage Capital, growing it to $750K AUM via crypto trading algorithms.
